about_the_game:
Welcome to Get Rich Slow, a life simulator with roguelite elements that lets you experience an entire life in a day. Make the choices that determine your character's fate and shape their story. You'll face a variety of events and challenges, from finding a job to starting a family or business, and you'll have to manage your finances, relationships, and health along the way.

Optimize Your Schedule


Create any number of daily schedules that you can apply to different days of the week. Set weekly, monthly, and yearly repeating tasks.

See the Future


In Get Rich Slow, you can choose to retire at any age and see a projection of your character's future, including how long their funds will last, how happy they'll be and how long they'll live. You'll have to balance your happiness and financial stability, making choices that affect both in the short and long term. The game's events and your actions will have an additive or multiplicative effect on your happiness and finances.

Infinite Replayablilty


Roguelite features, such as the ability to play the game as one of the children you bore in the previous life, make Get Rich Slow enjoyable to play over and over again. Starting a new life is just as fun as finishing.

Live the Life You've Always Wanted... and Face the Consequences


With a wide variety of events and actions to choose from, each playthrough of Get Rich Slow is unique. Will you focus on building a successful career, or prioritize your relationships and personal fulfillment? The choice is yours, and the consequences are yours to bear.

Experience life like never before in Get Rich Slow.

content_descriptors.notes: Describes alcohol and tobacco use and abuse.
